George Ricker

  1. Foster Name: George R.
  2. Foster Family: William J. and Nellie B. Jennings
  3. Location of Family: Prairie Dog, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Alma, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1892-12-18, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1964-04-23, Grand Island, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Listed as adopted son in 1910 census. No longer lived in the Jennings household by 1920.
  11. Source: 1900 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1920 United States Federal Census
